question.text: You see this sign ahead. You should expect the road to

explanation.text: Adjust your speed in good time and select the correct gear for your speed. Going too fast into the bend could cause you to lose control. Braking late and harshly while changing direction reduces your vehicle’s grip on the road, and is likely to cause a skid.
